article_metadata.description: To the mystery persons who visited with state Sen. Bart Hester, R-Cave Springs, about the potential impact of a vote to shut down Arkansas' entire Medicaid system, we offer sincere appreciation.

og.title: NWA editorial: Knowing the limits
